title: Multifactorial evaluation of an ultra-fast process for electrospinning of recycled expanded polystyrene to manufacture high-efficiency membranes for nanoparticle air filtration
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 362

Author(s): Felipe de Aquino Lima, Paulo Augusto Marques Chagas, Ana Carolina Sguizzato Honorato, Edilton Nunes da Silva, Mônica Lopes Aguiar, Vádila Giovana Guerra
